channel.title: 637 Eclipse need help with hp!
channel.description:
hi guys! so i have coded eclipse 637 for awhile, so i havn't really been killing monster, but now i just coded frost dragons, and i had to check the spawn timer, and what i see is all the monster have 100 hp, ( 10x ), http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/201/trollg.png/ <--- see here
then i go to NPCDefinitions10775.xml for example, i click edit i go to lifepoints, it says ithave 1900 Lp (x10) but, it do only have 100 (x10)
guys please help..
